data.text: @issybryonyh Take it easy -I thought I’m fine it’s just covid hangover so went for a 50k ride immediately followed by a 15k Southdowns way - 2 days later couldn’t get out of bed that was 4 weeks ago - got post covid viral fatigue ( yes it’s a thing) - so take it really really easy for a week
@issybryonyh Hope you are feeling better soon.
@issybryonyh Just possible my PCR was done too late, then?  I was feeling better by the time PCR kit arrived.  One of Sue’s friends was the same, negative on all LFTs but then positive on PCR
@NiqStencil John was +ve on PCR over Christmas but consistently negative on LFT. This time round positive on everything!

@issybryonyh Yes, 2+ years ago we’d have considered it just a bug - but I’ve never had that feeling before, like someone heavy sat on my chest - yet Covid negative, most odd.  Ok now but whole family have been knocked out by it.
@issybryonyh It was me that fell asleep on a doner Kebab pizza, then ate it when I woke up, enjoying its vague warmth. But the Chinese was someone else.
@NiqStencil We are now negative but must confess initially I thought it was just another toddler bug!
@issybryonyh Lad I know woke up with a similar feeling. It was only after he’d launched it across the room that he realised it was his Chinese that he’d fallen asleep eating.
@issybryonyh Been feeling much the same over the last couple of weeks but consistently tested -ve on LFT and PCRs
